Title: Chariots of War
Plot: Xena defends a town against a band of thugs led by a father and son duo, and when she is wounded, Gabrielle is left worrying for the warrior princess.
GuestStars: Nick Kokotakis, Jeff Thomas, Stuart Turner, Patrick Morrison, Ruth Morrison, Morgan Palmer-Hubbard, Dane Jerro, Robert Harte, Nigel Godfrey
